name: F1: World Championship Edition
overview: F1: World Championship Edition is a Formula 1 racing game with real teams and drivers from the 1994 season including Benetton, Ferrari, Williams, Jordan, Lotus, Minardi, Tyrrell & McLaren. There are 16 circuits including the Monaco Grand Prix. The game includes a championship knockout and training mode. It is the sequel to the game Formula One (1993).
